content.raw: I manually verified the PDFs generated from the DOT files on a few smaller test files and `tunnel_qual.tsv`, individually and in comparison with the PDFs generated by the original `topo_tsv.py`. The vertices are exactly the same, and the edge costs are the same. So I’m approving.
content.html: I manually verified the PDFs generated from the DOT files on a few smaller test files and tunnel_qual.tsv, individually and in comparison with the PDFs generated by the original topo_tsv.py. The vertices are exactly the same, and the edge costs are the same. So I’m approving.
